argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> j e. A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> Locally A = A ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> j e. Locally A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> x e. j ) |
| 5 |  | #P_llyrest | |- ( ( j e. Locally A /\ x e. j ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. Locally A ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. Locally A ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_restnlly | |- ( Locally A = A -> N-Locally A = Locally A ) |
| 9 |  | #P_id | |- ( Locally A = A -> Locally A = A ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( Locally A = A -> N-Locally A = A ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( N-Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> j e. A ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( N-Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> N-Locally A = A ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( N-Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> j e. N-Locally A ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( N-Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> x e. j ) |
| 15 |  | #P_nllyrest | |- ( ( j e. N-Locally A /\ x e. j ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. N-Locally A ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( N-Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. N-Locally A ) |
| 17 | 16, 12 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( N-Locally A = A /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. A ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_restnlly | |- ( N-Locally A = A -> N-Locally A = Locally A ) |
| 19 |  | #P_id | |- ( N-Locally A = A -> N-Locally A = A ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( N-Locally A = A -> Locally A = A ) |
| 21 | 10, 20 | #P_impbii | |- ( Locally A = A <-> N-Locally A = A ) |
